# your code goes here# your code goes here
from math import pow
test_cases = input()
count = 0 
numbers = [0]*10
while count < test_cases :
	text = raw_input()
	min_index = 0
	min_count = 0
	i = 0
	for num in text.split():
		numbers[i] = (int(num))
		if(numbers[min_index]  > int(num)):
			min_index = i
			min_count = 1
		elif(numbers[min_index] == int(num)):
			min_count += 1
		i += 1
	minimum_value = numbers[min_index]
	if( minimum_value == 0 and min_count >1 ):
		for i in range(1,10):
			if(numbers[i] == 0):
				print i;
				break;
	elif( min_index == 0 ):
		minimum_num = int(pow(10,numbers[min_index]+1))
		if min_count == 1:
			print minimum_num
		else:
			for i in range(1,10):
				if(numbers[i] == minimum_value):
					minimum_num  = min(minimum_num,int(str(i)*(minimum_value+1)))
					break;
			print minimum_num
	else:
		print str(min_index)*(minimum_value+1)
	count += 1
